About universAAL Security Suite

The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL security.

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
universAAL Security Dummy Authenticator This module should only be used for testing purposes, in controled environments, since it does not authenticate at all
universAAL Security Profiling Server Managed User Password Authenticator The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL security.
universAAL Security UserPassword Authentication client The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL security.
universAAL Security Basic Cryptographic Services Offers universAALized Java security services for hashing, encrypting, signing and verifying
universAAL Security Session Manager The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL security.
universAAL Security Authorisator Offers Role-based security access management services
universAAL Security Authorisator Delegation Extension Extends Authorisation serivces with the capability of users delegating roles to other users
universAAL Security Anonymization Offers RDF reference scrambling services
universAAL Security Karaf Feature The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL security.
